TopicTitle: Whacky but pretty much functional thread!

Articles.Content:
I am starting this thread to show off some whacky aircraft/spacecraft you have built. I will start us off with a whacky spacecraft of my own! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) I built this aircraft just with the idea that I would create something kind of sci-fi like, or kind of like star wars. I think it came out pretty well, and I am quite pleased with it ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/Xe0vX)
This exchange of Spacecraft has been moved to Spacecraft Exchange.

> 
> This exchange of Spacecraft has been moved to Spacecraft Exchange.

Thanks ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

This seems a good a place as any to roll out my old Lepton shuttle again.

![PHcyZhf.png](https://i.imgur.com/PHcyZhf.png)

It was my try at having a shuttle which was easier to balance around the center of mass, so I could have a larger payload fraction. It worked, mostly. The external tank usually exploded when it hit the ground, but otherwise it flew like a dream.

Since it worked so well, I think I might return to the concept, and make it look prettier.

![pozC4r3.png](http://i.imgur.com/pozC4r3.png)

![siFWmF6.png](http://i.imgur.com/siFWmF6.png)

![51SQ82g.png](https://i.imgur.com/51SQ82g.png)
